TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Yes, we count money in $oups, not in £ibras.

Waiter! Please, recalculate the bill in DeutschMarx.

Edited January 30, 2022 by kerbiloid

W: Maybe.

C: W, why is this soup dead?

Live soup is too hard to catch.

Waiter! There's a Castor 4 rocket motor in my soup!

It's a castor oil, to help the nutrition.

Waiter! A fried thunderbird, please.

Waiter: It is parked outside. You are going to need an auto electrician, it is also not edible.

Customer: There is a Supermarionette swimming in my soup.

Alpha Beth has made her alphabet soup out of them.

Bartender! What does your bar tend?

[WAITER] As nobody said it,

EGAP WEN KOOL YEH!

[ME] Waiter, there's a Hyperboloid in my soup!

Yes, somebody was hyped and threw the hunt bolas into your dish.

Waiter! Please, tell me. That waitress, standing next to the bar counter, with blonde hair and funny smile... Yes, she...  Can she gift you a toothbrush or just come here instead of you?

Um... sure. She'll be right over.

Waiter! What is your Tuesday special?

The Twisty Tuesday Tomato Taco! Enjoy it!

Waiter! There's an Frog saying KSP Kopernicus stuff on my soup!

Oh yes! That's R-T-B's screaming contraption!

Waiter! There's a Module Manager error on my soup!

Incorrect soup version.

Waiter! Why did you bring me the frog thighs? I ordered frog tongues.

Waiter. Sorry Sir but I have been throwing up ever since you ordered. We don't have that.

Customer: Where is the soup in my bowl?

It's in your bowl, you have answered yourself.

Waiter! A handful of sublimated solid soup, please.

Waiter: We don't handle them directly as that is unsantitory. Here have a wax wrapped cube.

Customer: Is there some boiled water to go with my solid soup cube?

We have the boiled water, the fried water, the baked water, and even the dry water.

Waiter! Haven't you forgotten a spoon? How should I eat this water?

Your hand!

Waiter, did you give me water on a fancy bowl?!

Yes, on the top of it.

Waiter! Where are the bowls in your bowling? I can see only balls and bottles.

P.S.
Btw, if throw a bowl at the diner bottle shelf, does it turn the diner in a bowling?

Edited February 5, 2022 by kerbiloid

1 hour ago, kerbiloid said:

Btw, if throw a bowl at the diner bottle shelf, does it turn the diner in a bowling?

What a stupid question  

1 hour ago, kerbiloid said:

Waiter! Where are the bowls in your bowling? I can see only balls and bottles.

Sir, you're in Jeb's Exotic Bowls of Soup - Very Arbitrary Laughter, or we call JEBS - VAL.

Waiter! What does JEBS - VAL mean in your restaurant?

Probably something from the ethnic cuisine. It was a folk restaurant previously.

Walter! Are you a waiter?

Walter is a customer. Kustomah is a waiter.

Customer: Is there any sense left in my soup?

Yes. The sense of taste. A moment  later you will fell it.

Janitor! May I, please, your bucket and clothes for a second, to wash this plate, as your kitchen didn't.

Yeah sure, seems like we got a Chicken, not a Kitchen.

Waiter! There's a Unknown mod called 000_NotSus in my soup!

Waiter: No problems Sir. Our soup will dissolve it very quickly.

Customer: Ahh, my soup seems to be eating the bowl.

War amongst inanimate objects isn't my obligation nor it is in my contract. You deal with it.

Waiter! A new soup, please!
